GSD.product_version: versions from v5.3 to before v5.10.127
GSD.description:
net/tls: fix tls_sk_proto_close executed repeatedly

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.127 by commit e82376b632473790781a182b10823a4b5dbf6606, it was introduced in version v5.3 by commit 95fa145479fbc0a0c1fd3274ceb42ec03c042a4a. For more details please see the references link.
